=== try/catch complex ===
run : Error ! I64
run = try risky catch 0

combo : Error ! I64
combo = try (try risky catch 1) catch 2

---
(source_file
  (type_signature (identifier) (type (type_error_union (type_base (type_constructor)) (type (type_application (type_base (type_constructor)))))))
  (value_definition (identifier) (expression (catch_expr (expression (try_expr (expression (identifier)))) (expression (literal (number))))))
  (type_signature (identifier) (type (type_error_union (type_base (type_constructor)) (type (type_application (type_base (type_constructor)))))))
  (value_definition (identifier) (expression (catch_expr (expression (parenthesized (expression (catch_expr (expression (try_expr (expression (identifier)))) (expression (literal (number))))))) (expression (literal (number))))))
